description.value:
This thin tube contains nanomachines and several filters that destroy contaminants or trap them in a washable compartment in the middle of the straw. When you activate a survival straw, water-based liquids you drink through it are automatically filtered and purified, removing any @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.GnEF27Oot3zqTaBQ]{Diseases}, @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Drugs}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poisons} present in the liquid. A survival straw uses 1 charge per gallon of water filtered (or fraction thereof).

 

Capacity 20; Usage See text
